name: Command Bots
description:
My game for Trijam 84! Went a little over on the hours, I think I did 4 1/2.

The year is 200X, and only two cities remain among the ruins of the United States: Top City and Bottom City. As the leader of Bottom City, send your robot droves to raze Top City, and become the sole survivors of the USA.

I did the super dope graphics. Used an old song I'd made for a different project.

To do (maybe)

make sure dem-o can only destroy one unit

make the robots look a little better while moving
